## Expectation.toBeAnArrayWith() method

Checks if the value is an array containing all of the provided items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toBeAnArrayWith(this: Expectation<ReadonlyArray<any>>, ...expectedItems: ReadonlyArray<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Expectation](./earljs.expectation.md)<!-- -->&lt;ReadonlyArray&lt;any&gt;&gt; |  |
|  expectedItems | ReadonlyArray&lt;any&gt; | values or matchers to look for in the matched array. Order of the items doesn't matter. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
